pkgmetadata.longdescription: Create Hex Stickers with 'shiny' // Create hexagonal shape sticker image. 'polaroid' can be used in user's web browser. 'polaroid' can be used in 'shinyapps.io'. In both way, user can download created 'hexSticker' as 'PNG' image. 'polaroid' is built based on 'argonDash', 'colourpicker' and 'hexSticker' R package.
